basics.name: Mudassir Ali
basics.label: Senior Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: Web developer with specialisation in Frontend Technologies with good sense of UI and UX design.

highlights: Worked on the Print product and it's subsequent rewrite in the new tech stack which was written in React, TypeScript and Mobx
Worked in the editing team, specifically in the element recoloring. Involved in a architectural refactor that would work well with simultaneous collaboration, color search
I was also actively involved in code reviews, mentoring, strategy planning, hiring and giving technology talks in the internal forums
Contributed a lot of puns & emojis on the Slack
Setup the entire frontend application from scratch using AngularJS
Developed features as per the business requirements
Often wore the hat of a product designer and made UI/UX decisions
Setup the blogging platform "Diligently" using Ghost
Worked on setting up the web Frontend stack, building the REST API, integrating payment gateway, transactional emails & SMS providers. Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, AngularJS
Wore the hat of a Product designer and designed the UI/UX to make the flow as intuitive as possible. Wireframed in Balsamiq mockups and designed in Sketch
Setup the deployment process for consumer, admin and vendor applications using AWS OpsWorks
Actively involved in product ideation & feature prioritisation

work.summary: One of the two Frontend engineers. Worked primarily on BackboneJS, developed reusable user interface components, shipped features, involved in code reviews and UX design.
Worked on shipping features for a Fintech company PrimeRevenue which was one of our clients based in Atlanta. Involved in shipping features for their products SCiMap & SCiCustomer.
highlights: Translated business requirements provided by marketing into customer facing UI designs.
Implemented upgrades, patches, code releases & database changes.
Did oversee unit testing, code reviews, debugging and documentation efforts.

work.summary: I'm one of the core contributors of Json Resume, an open source initiative to create a JSON-based standard for resumes.
highlights: Developed a responsive theme [Elegant](https://github.com/mudassir0909/jsonresume-theme-elegant), which won the [competition held in November 2014](https://github.com/mudassir0909/jsonresume-theme-elegant/issues/22) for the best theme.
Wrote a node module [theme-utils](https://github.com/jsonresume/theme-utils) which provides a useful set of methods for jsonresume theme developers to build themes faster.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Sciences, Pilani
